name: isle (zzox)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows/WASD: move/hit rhythm note
  • SPACE/X: cast/interact
  • ENTER: pause
  • ESCAPE: leave menu/leave fight

Hold "cast" longer to increase casting distance.

This game saves at the end of each day.

Check the pond, river, and ocean, night or day for different types of fish!

Made with HaxeFlixel

Plays best in Chrome, Firefox or Edge. Older computers may also see more desync issues.

Uses these two fonts:

  • windows command prompt font
  • miniset font
